name: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and React to build modern web applications.

name: Microprocessors & Embedded Systems
description: Explore ARM architecture, embedded C, and real-time operating systems (RTOS).

name: Software Engineering Principles
description: Master Agile, SOLID principles, and CI/CD pipelines for scalable software development.

name: Database Systems
description: Design SQL/NoSQL databases, optimize queries, and implement ACID transactions.

name: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Deploy serverless apps using AWS Lambda, S3, and DynamoDB.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Understand encryption, penetration testing, and OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities.

name: Mobile App Development (Flutter)
description: Build cross-platform apps with Flutter and Firebase backend integration.
